changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE FUNCTION get_subtree(item_id VARCHAR(10)) RETURNS TABLE (id VARCHAR(10), level INT) AS $BODY$ WITH RECURSIVE subtree(id, child, depth) AS ( SELECT a.aggregation_id, a.item_id, 1 FROM aggregation_children a WHERE a.aggregation_id=(SELECT item.id FROM item WHERE item.id = $1) UNION ALL SELECT a.aggregation_id, a.item_id, s.depth+1 FROM aggregation_children a, subtree s WHERE a.aggregation_id = s.child ) SELECT DISTINCT(subtree_tbl.child), subtree_tbl.depth FROM (SELECT * FROM subtree) AS subtree_tbl UNION (SELECT item.id as child, 0 FROM item WHERE item.id = $1) $BODY$ LANGUAGE sql;
